casebody.data:
Sami Restaurant, LLC t/a Bistro 18
v.
District of Columbia Alcoholic Beverage Control Board NO. 14-AA-277 District of Columbia Court of Appeals May 04, 2016

Dist. of Columbia Dept. of Employment Services - Compensation Review Bd.

Disposition: Granted, in part; Reversed, in part; Vacated, in part.
